actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to prohibit discriminatory employment practices with respect to physically handicapped persons.

summary.text: Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to include discrimination of the physically handicapped as an unlawful employment practice. Stipulates that employers are not required to provide any unusual or special services to physically handicapped employees.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit discriminatory employment practices with respect to physically handicapped persons.
